scenario_text.value: Why are all of you here?

When I came to I was by myself. I’ve been
going around looking for everyone.

It looks like all of us were separated
somehow.
I got separated from Takuma, too!
And me from Aoi... I was so upset.

Really? That doesn’t sound good. Do you think
Miyuki and Haru got caught up in this, too?

Yeah, we’d better hurry and look for them.
The others too, of course.

Yes, yes you’re right. We need to find them
right away!
We have to save everyone quickly!
